overview: Carmella Lotti, Matthew's 87-year-old grandmother, talks about the thirteen odd medical prescriptions she takes on a daily basis to keep herself alive. Intended as a new wave public service announcement, it offers a grim look at a future dependent on medication with no alternative recourse.  Carmella passed away on September 30, 2019 in her sleep. She was 103 years old.
title: What I Need to Live
